titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Energy to convey to the city of Bartlesville, Oklahoma, the former site of the NIPER facility of the Department of Energy.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Environment.

bill.summary: 9/13/1999--Introduced. Instructs the Secretary of Energy to convey to the city of Bartlesville, Oklahoma, for no consideration, the acreage comprising the former site of the National Institute of Petroleum Energy Research.
